COMMAND.NAME: lineoffsettoposition
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.

DESCRIPTION.P: Inverse of positiontolineoffset. Given a lineNumber and a character offset within the line, return the position in bufferName.
NOTE:if lineNumber or offset is out of range,they will be set to the nearest legal value.

COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
